title: Augusta County: Thomas M. Smiley to His Aunt, April 9, [1862]
summary: Thomas M. Smiley describes troop movements and battles in Winchester, Yorktown, and Corinth, TN. He discusses bad weather, illness in camp, and election of officers.
keywords: Battle Description, Camp Life, Death/Casualties, Military Authority, Prisons/Prisoners, Troop Movement, American Civil War
